title: 3 and Out - Watson Trade Talk, Lance/Jimmy G Time Share, Inside Final Cutdowns, Rookie QB Evals, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Watson Trade Talk, Lance/Jimmy G Time Share, Inside Final Cutdowns, Rookie QB Evals, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John talks QB's and why any GM would be insane to trade for Deshaun Watson right now, the challenges facing teams with unvaxxed QB's, and how Trey Lance/Jimmy G could both see significant PT this season (2:00). He also looks at why he's all in on Philip Rivers' move to high school coaching (12:00), his inside perspective on final cutdowns, why the trend of players sitting the entire preseason has gone overboard (19:00), and his evaluations of the top rookie QB's as the preseason winds down (35:00). He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag (48:00). Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
